Arabic: duaArabic:"سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي سَخَّرَ لَنَا هَـٰذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لَهُ مُقْرِنِينَ وَإِنَّا إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا لَمُنقَلِبُونَ"
Urdu: duaUrdu:"اللہ عزوجل کا شکر ہے، پاک ہے وہ جس نے ہمارے لئے اس(سواری کو) مسخر کیا اور ہم اس کو فرمانبردار نہیں بنا سکتے تھے۔"
English: duaEnglish:"Thanks to Allah Azzawajal. Pure is he who subdude this
Benefits: other wise we could not make this obedient."
Description: benefits:"Benefits of Reading             Dua for Traveling & Journey             (Safar Aur Sawari Ki Dua)"
column8: description:" Dua is an Arabic word that means to summon or to call out. It is also known as pray
column10: or invocation. It has great importance in Islam. According to one hadith of Prophet Muhammad (Peace Be Upon Him)
column11: dua is the essence of worship. When a person prays to Allah with a true heart
column12: it strengthens his/her belief. The Dua for Traveling & Journey (Safar Aur Sawari Ki Dua) is also very beneficial. Dua is among one of the most powerful and effective acts of worship. It gives the feeling of connection with Allah in any place at any time. Muslims call on Allah several times throughout the day and night. Throughout the Holy Quran
column13: Allah encourages people to call on him as he is the only one who can lay our uncertainties
column16: and fears. It does not just enhance the feeling of closeness with Allah
column17: but also raises faith and offers relief and hope to believers. There is a dua for almost every act in Islam. The Holy Prophet Muhammad (Peace Be Upon Him) taught the dua to his Ummah for different matters such as safety
column24: the Dua for Traveling & Journey (Safar Aur Sawari Ki Dua) is among the key supplications. Being Muslim we should memorize duas including the Dua for Traveling & Journey (Safar Aur Sawari Ki Dua). It will not just save us from any harm but will enlighten our lives with different blessings. Here
column25: you can easily read this dua and can share it with your friends and family members. You can also read other supplications on their respective pages."}
